Package de.hawlandshut.java1.oopbasics.shapes

Class Point2D

java.lang.Object
de.hawlandshut.java1.oopbasics.shapes.Point2D
public class Point2D
extends java.lang.Object
Represents a point in the two-dimensional plane. The coordinates are integer.

    • distance

      public double distance​(Point2D other)
      Returns the distance between this and the other point. The distance is Euclidean.
      Parameters:
      other - other point (must not be null)
      Returns:
      return Euclidean distance between the two points.
